roleset.name: board, reside in a room
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on SMS.

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: Hallie and I decided it 'd be best for us to room together , and Alexa-1 had plans *PRO*-1 to room with our friend Ellen .... but then Alexa decided that NO , she wanted Hallie that day and made my life hell
